targets.expr: (sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume="C:", fqdn=~"$fqdn"}) by (fqdn) - sum(windows_logical_disk_free_bytes{volume="C:", fqdn=~"$fqdn"}) by (fqdn)) / sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume="C:", fqdn=~"$fqdn"}) by (fqdn) * 100

(sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume="D:", fqdn=~"$fqdn"}) by (fqdn) - sum(windows_logical_disk_free_bytes{volume="D:", fqdn=~"$fqdn"}) by (fqdn)) / sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume="D:", fqdn=~"$fqdn"}) by (fqdn) * 100
